Subtitle: Designing your project - together
Introduction section 1: As a landscape designer, I worked for public and private partners. I will help you with all your landscaping projects. We will build your project together and then I will show you the rendering in several formats : photomontage, drawing, plan, 3D view, plant pallet. Thus, you will have a comprehensive file giving you a global overview of your project. Based in the PACA region, I will be able to come in person for projects in this region. It is also possible to do remote work via pictures and plans.
Professional Text: If there is no landscape designer in your company and you want to show a structured and visual project to your customers, I offer you my services. We will work together to build a comprehensive file :
Private Text: Wishing to landscape your garden ? Looking for ideas ? I'm here to support you for the design of this living space. With a customized follow-up, we will build your project. Once the file is finalized :
Private Text Elem 1: I will look for the most attractive companies, and I will ask for cost estimates.
Private Text Elem 3: I will provide you support to do the realization yourself.
Diagnostic Text: I analyze the existing land and its constraints. I take into account your desires and your needs, to create a garden that fully corresponds to your expectations.
Project Text: Thanks to several medias ( plans, photomontages, etc. ) you will visualize directly your project, and get a better apprehension of this new space.
Advice Text: I will help you choose the plants to keep the project consistent with the climate, and I will guide you in order to select the best materials to build a harmonious space.
Resume Text 1: With the professional degree in Landscape Design and Infographics, I first worked as draughtswoman for public projects in Normandie.
Resume Text 2: Then I moved to Les Alpes maritimes where I worked as a draughtswoman but also as a landscape worker. This experience allowed me to develop my technical knowledge.
Resume Text 3: With this expertise, I decided to create Graphite Paysage to have more challenges to deal with, and support you in every aspects of your project.
Want to say hello: Want to talk about your project ?
Slider Tips: You can move the cursor to see the before / after effect
